players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob's death must have been a mafia hit. I think Alice is the mafioso."
Diana: "Charlie's accusation against Alice is suspicious. We should investigate Charlie instead of jumping to conclusions."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Charlie's suspicion is unfounded."
Charlie: "Bob's death was a mafia hit, and I think Alice is the mafioso. Diana should investigate me instead of accusing me."
